verses.text: \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w guest|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* tent? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*?

\w The|strong="H1696"\w* \w person|strong="H1980"\w* whose \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8549"\w*, whose conduct \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w right|strong="H6664"\w*, whose words \w are|strong="H3824"\w* true \w and|strong="H1980"\w* sincere;

\w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H7453"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* there sits \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w slander|strong="H7270"\w*, \w who|strong="H7138"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*,

\w nor|strong="H3808"\w* cruelly insult \w a|strong="H3068"\w* neighbour, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* regards \w with|strong="H3068"\w* contempt those \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* honours those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* obey \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* keeps \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*, whatever \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cost,

whose \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* lent \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w interest|strong="H5392"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w takes|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H7810"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* hurt \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* person \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* stand firm.
